bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of muteness in children brought forth by an outbreak of dian xian 癲癇 , peak-illness with epilepsy. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hu zhang tian nan xing 虎掌天南星 quotes Quan you xin jian 全幼心鑒 : 小兒癇喑，癇後喑不能言。以天南星濕紙包煨，為末，雄豬膽汁調 服二字 , “ Children’s epilepsy muteness : when [children] are mute and cannot speak following an epilepsy [seizure]. Wrap tian nan xing in moist paper and roast over a slow fire. Then grind to a powder and mix with the bile of a boar. Ingest the amount covering 2 characters on a coin”.
